
Default Races.md:


0000:  4D 44 42 32 
Classes.md:
    0004:  02 00 7B 00 75 13 02 00 04 00 7B 00 
    0010:  01 00 00 00 06 00 7B 00 B5 
Races.md:
    0004:  02 00 FC 00 05 11 02 00 04 00 FC 00 
    0010:  01 00 00 00 06 00 FC 00 4F 
Monsters.md:
    0004:  55 00 E0 01 75 13 03 00 0D 02 E0 01 
    0010:  01 00 00 00 10 02 E0 01 81 B7 03 


0019-0401:  00s (Same in both Races.md and Classes.md)



Header:     02 00 3B 02 00 00 03 00 FF FF 
giant rat:          DB 01 31          00 00 00 00 00 80 01 00 67 69 61 6E 74 20 72 61 74 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 0C 00 E8 03 1E 00 14 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 06 00 02 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 15 00 4E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 09 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 02 00 04 00 32 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 E8 03 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 00 00 
thug:               DC 01 31 30       00 00 00 00 00 80 0A 00 74 68 75 67 00 6F 72 6D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 03 00 00 00 1C 00 E8 03 28 00 19 00 0E 00 01 00 05 00 06 00 02 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 4C 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 05 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 5C 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0B 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 2C 00 00
Header:     02 00 39 02 00 00 B5 00 B4 00 
Sheriff Lionheart:  DC 01 34 30       00 00 00 00 00 80 28 00 53 68 65 72 69 66 66 20 4C 69 6F 6E 68 65 61 72 74 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 00 00 40 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 96 00 00 00 E8 03 E8 03 78 00 5A 00 50 00 08 00 00 00 05 00 01 04 01 00 01 00 01 00 66 00 44 05 88 05 A7 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 22 00 8B 00 51 00 39 00 00 00 0A 00 0F 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 44 05 04 04 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 F4 01 00 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 1E 00 1E 00 78 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 50 00 40 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 C8 00 C8 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 47 02 00 00 00 00 0F 27 00 
gnome inventor:     DD 01 34 30 30    00 00 00 00 00 80 90 01 67 6E 6F 6D 65 20 69 6E 76 65 6E 74 6F 72 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 00 00 40 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 19 00 00 00 FA 00 E8 03 2D 00 32 00 50 00 03 00 32 00 18 00 03 00 01 00 01 00 06 00 84 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 0A 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 05 00 00 00 00 00 92 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 8C 01 8C 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 43 00 FE 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FE 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 19 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0C 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 F4 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 19 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 50 00 
Header:     02 00 37 02 00 00 D2 01 00 00 
frost serpent:      DD 01 31 30 30    00 00 00 00 00 80 64 00 66 72 6F 73 74 20 73 65 72 70 65 6E 74 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 00 00 49 00 E8 03 36 00 32 00 0A 00 01 00 0F 00 0E 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 CE FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 64 00 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 00 
hooded man:         DE 01 31 30 30 30 00 00 00 00 00 80 E8 03 68 6F 6F 64 65 64 20 6D 61 6E 00 68 79 64 72 61 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 7D 00 00 00 E2 04 E8 03 5F 00 64 00 0A 00 01 00 0F 27 02 00 00 03 00 00 00 00 06 00 35 05 38 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 8B 00 22 00 39 00 9E 00 00 00 1E 00 64 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 64 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 2C 01 28 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0F 27 
Header:     02 00 38 02 00 00 31 00 30 00 
earth elemental:    DD 01 31 32 30    00 00 00 00 00 80 78 00 65 61 72 74 68 20 65 6C 65 6D 65 6E 74 61 6C 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 11 00 00 00 B9 00 E8 03 37 00 28 00 1E 00 08 00 0F 27 19 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 6D 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 C2 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0E 00 0E 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 23 00 0F 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0F 27 00 
dark druid:         DD 01 31 32 31    00 00 00 00 00 80 79 00 64 61 72 6B 20 64 72 75 69 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 7D 00 E8 03 37 00 32 00 14 00 02 00 15 00 19 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 CB 01 DA 01 77 02 00 00 00 00 03 03 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 1E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 CB 01 22 00 47 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 90 01 00 00 0A 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 04 00 04 00 50 00 50 00 00 00 00 00 0E 00 0D 00 0D 00 00 00 00 00 4D 01 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0D 0D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 50 00
Header:     03 00 5B 01 00 00 A0 00 A3 00 
feline prisoner:    DD 01 33 36 38    00 00 00 00 00 80 70 01 66 65 6C 69 6E 65 20 70 72 69 73 6F 6E 65 72 00 61 74 69 6F 6E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 0F 27 00 00 0F 27 E8 03 5A 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 0F 27 02 00 03 00 01 00 0C 00 0C 00 D1 08 3C 04 F9 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 3C 04 4D 00 42 00 55 03 A0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 14 28 3C 50 00 00 00 00 08 00 08 00 20 00 64 00 82 00 00 00 1D 00 6E 00 28 00 18 01 00 00 C8 00 C8 00 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 28 28 28 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0F 27 00 
fallen angel:       DD 01 33 36 39    00 00 00 00 00 80 71 01 66 61 6C 6C 65 6E 20 61 6E 67 65 6C 00 6D 69 6E 61 74 69 6F 6E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 58 02 00 00 A4 06 E8 03 5A 00 50 00 4B 00 07 00 0F 27 16 00 03 02 01 00 03 00 08 00 10 04 B8 03 DA 00 47 01 00 00 00 00 64 05 28 00 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 15 00 22 00 39 00 1C 00 8B 00 63 00 32 00 63 00 04 00 28 00 DA 00 AE 01 B8 01 01 04 35 01 87 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 C0 C6 2D 00 0A 14 1E 2D 41 00 00 00 19 00 19 00 00 00 32 00 96 00 64 00 3C 00 00 00 F0 00 90 01 28 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 1E 1E 1E 1E 1E 00 00 00 00 00 3C 00 0F 27 00 
tentacled abom..:   DC 01 33 37       00 00 00 00 00 80 25 00 74 65 6E 74 61 63 6C 65 64 20 61 62 6F 6D 69 6E 61 74 69 6F 6E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 08 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0F 00 00 00 64 00 E8 03 30 00 14 00 14 00 02 00 0F 00 08 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 4E 05 4E 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 04 00 04 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0C 00 0C 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 F4 01 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 C8 




                     a  b  c          |<---- d ------>|  e    |<---- f --------------------------------------------------------------------------------->|  g  h  i  j  k |<-- l ----->| |<-- m ----->|  n     o     p  q     r     s     t     u     v     w     x     y     z     1  2  3     4     5     6     7     8     9     0           A  B  C  D  E                          F     G  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->| |<- exp ->| |<-- H -------------->|  I           J                       K                             L                             M           N             00 P
giant rat:          DB 01 31          00 00 00 00 00 80 01 00 67 69 61 6E 74 20 72 61 74 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 0C 00 E8 03 1E 00 14 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 06 00 02 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 15 00 4E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 09 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 02 00 04 00 32 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 E8 03 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 00 00 
thug:               DC 01 31 30       00 00 00 00 00 80 0A 00 74 68 75 67 00 6F 72 6D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 03 00 00 00 1C 00 E8 03 28 00 19 00 0E 00 01 00 05 00 06 00 02 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 4C 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 05 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 5C 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0B 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 2C 00 00
Sheriff Lionheart:  DC 01 34 30       00 00 00 00 00 80 28 00 53 68 65 72 69 66 66 20 4C 69 6F 6E 68 65 61 72 74 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 00 00 40 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 96 00 00 00 E8 03 E8 03 78 00 5A 00 50 00 08 00 00 00 05 00 01 04 01 00 01 00 01 00 66 00 44 05 88 05 A7 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 22 00 8B 00 51 00 39 00 00 00 0A 00 0F 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 44 05 04 04 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 F4 01 00 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 1E 00 1E 00 78 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 50 00 40 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 C8 00 C8 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 47 02 00 00 00 00 0F 27 00 
gnome inventor:     DD 01 34 30 30    00 00 00 00 00 80 90 01 67 6E 6F 6D 65 20 69 6E 76 65 6E 74 6F 72 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 00 00 40 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 19 00 00 00 FA 00 E8 03 2D 00 32 00 50 00 03 00 32 00 18 00 03 00 01 00 01 00 06 00 84 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 0A 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 05 00 00 00 00 00 92 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 8C 01 8C 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 43 00 FE 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FE 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 19 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0C 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 F4 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 19 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 50 00 
frost serpent:      DD 01 31 30 30    00 00 00 00 00 80 64 00 66 72 6F 73 74 20 73 65 72 70 65 6E 74 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 00 00 49 00 E8 03 36 00 32 00 0A 00 01 00 0F 00 0E 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 CE FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 64 00 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 00 
hooded man:         DE 01 31 30 30 30 00 00 00 00 00 80 E8 03 68 6F 6F 64 65 64 20 6D 61 6E 00 68 79 64 72 61 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 7D 00 00 00 E2 04 E8 03 5F 00 64 00 0A 00 01 00 0F 27 02 00 00 03 00 00 00 00 06 00 35 05 38 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 8B 00 22 00 39 00 9E 00 00 00 1E 00 64 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 64 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 2C 01 28 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0F 27 
earth elemental:    DD 01 31 32 30    00 00 00 00 00 80 78 00 65 61 72 74 68 20 65 6C 65 6D 65 6E 74 61 6C 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 11 00 00 00 B9 00 E8 03 37 00 28 00 1E 00 08 00 0F 27 19 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 6D 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 C2 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0E 00 0E 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 23 00 0F 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0F 27 00 
dark druid:         DD 01 31 32 31    00 00 00 00 00 80 79 00 64 61 72 6B 20 64 72 75 69 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 7D 00 E8 03 37 00 32 00 14 00 02 00 15 00 19 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 CB 01 DA 01 77 02 00 00 00 00 03 03 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 1E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 CB 01 22 00 47 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 90 01 00 00 0A 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 04 00 04 00 50 00 50 00 00 00 00 00 0E 00 0D 00 0D 00 00 00 00 00 4D 01 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0D 0D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 50 00
feline prisoner:    DD 01 33 36 38    00 00 00 00 00 80 70 01 66 65 6C 69 6E 65 20 70 72 69 73 6F 6E 65 72 00 61 74 69 6F 6E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 0F 27 00 00 0F 27 E8 03 5A 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 0F 27 02 00 03 00 01 00 0C 00 0C 00 D1 08 3C 04 F9 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 14 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 3C 04 4D 00 42 00 55 03 A0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 14 28 3C 50 00 00 00 00 08 00 08 00 20 00 64 00 82 00 00 00 1D 00 6E 00 28 00 18 01 00 00 C8 00 C8 00 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 28 28 28 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0F 27 00 
fallen angel:       DD 01 33 36 39    00 00 00 00 00 80 71 01 66 61 6C 6C 65 6E 20 61 6E 67 65 6C 00 6D 69 6E 61 74 69 6F 6E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 58 02 00 00 A4 06 E8 03 5A 00 50 00 4B 00 07 00 0F 27 16 00 03 02 01 00 03 00 08 00 10 04 B8 03 DA 00 47 01 00 00 00 00 64 05 28 00 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 15 00 22 00 39 00 1C 00 8B 00 63 00 32 00 63 00 04 00 28 00 DA 00 AE 01 B8 01 01 04 35 01 87 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 C0 C6 2D 00 0A 14 1E 2D 41 00 00 00 19 00 19 00 00 00 32 00 96 00 64 00 3C 00 00 00 F0 00 90 01 28 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 E8 03 E8 03 00 00 00 00 1E 1E 1E 1E 1E 00 00 00 00 00 3C 00 0F 27 00 
tentacled abom..:   DC 01 33 37       00 00 00 00 00 80 25 00 74 65 6E 74 61 63 6C 65 64 20 61 62 6F 6D 69 6E 61 74 69 6F 6E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 08 00 00 40 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0F 00 00 00 64 00 E8 03 30 00 14 00 14 00 02 00 0F 00 08 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 4E 05 4E 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 04 00 04 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0C 00 0C 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 F4 01 E8 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 C8 



a - how many bytes the next record is offset by
b - 01
c - some sort of record number.
d - 00 00 00 00 00 80
e - monster ID number
f - null terminated string of monster name.  Can have garbage after null since it's fixed width
g - Flags
    08 - Find first
    40 - High
    80 - First
    00 - Normal
    20 - Low
    10 - Last
h - Flags
    02 - Not hostile
    01 - Don't backstab
    04 - Check if alive
i - 00 -- constant?
j - 40 -- constant?
k - 00 - Unknown
    02 - Friend
    03 - Avoid
    04 - Enemy
    05 - Flee
    06 - Hangup
l - Pre-attack spell in string form
m - Attack spell in string form
n - Pre-attack spell max cast
o - Attack spell max cast
p - Sex flag
    00 It
    01 Male
    02 Female
    03 Unknown
q - Monster level
r - 00 00
s - HPs (seen/confirmed in MME, but not MegaMUD)
t - Energy
u - Magic resistance
v - Accuracy
w - AC
x - DR
y - Enslave level

z - This is location in the Group property.  
    OrcMansion = 0x26,
    SpecialCreateAtUser = 0x25,
    NewhavenGraveyardAndCrypt = 0x24,
    ProphecyOfPlagueMod9 = 0x20,
    SavageLandsMod7 = 0x1f,
    SmugglersMod5 = 0x1e,
    ObsidianPassageways = 0x1d,
    CrystalTunnels = 0x1c,
    CrackedPlainsAndLavaFields = 0x1b,
    FungusForestAndBlackFort = 0x1a,
    HazySwamp = 0x19,{ get; set; }
    DwarfMinesMod4 = 0x18,
    BlackWastelands = 0x17,
    BlackCavesMod3 = 0x16,
    AncientRuinsMod2 = 0x15,
    DesertMod6 = 0x14,
    Rhudaur = 0x13,
    NomadsAndMonastery = 0x12,
    FrozenCaverns = 0x11,
    RockyTrailNomads = 0x10,
    Monastery = 0x0f,
    CryptQuestMonsters = 0x0e,
    HornedDemon = 0x0d,
    CryptQuestArea = 0x0c,
    Labyrinth = 0x0b,
    GoblinCaves = 0x0a,
    DragonsTeethHills = 0x09,
    BlackHouseAndBelow = 0x08,
    GraveyardAndCrypt = 0x07,
    SlumsAndSewers = 0x06,
    GuardsTemplars = 0x05,
    UniquesShopkeepers = 0x02,
    Arena = 0x00,



1 - Type flag
    00 - Solo
    01 - Leader
    02 - Follower
    03 - Stationary

2 - Alignment
    00 - Good
    01 - Evil
    02 - Choatic Evil
    03 - Neutral
    04 - Lawful Good
    05 - Neutral Evil
    06 - Lawful Evil
    07 - Unknown

3 - Game max
4 - Regen (hours, it looks like)
5 - Location:  Map number
6 - Location:  Room number
7 - Item 1 Drop
8 - Item 2 Drop
9 - Item 3 Drop
0 - Item 4 Drop
    Item 5 Drop
A - Item 1 Drop Rate
B - Item 2 Drop Rate
C - Item 3 Drop Rate
D - Item 4 Drop Rate
    Item 5 Drop Rate
E - Cash drops, in the following way
    00   - runic
    0000 - plat
    0000 - gold
    0000 - silver
    0000 - copper
F - ??
G - Flags starting here?

exp - Experience!
H - Attack / Spell Percentages:  8 bytes, each a different percentage
I - Attack #1 Minimum, repeated for some reason
J - Minimum per attack for attacks 2, 3, 4, 5 (2 bytes each)
K - Maximum per attack for attacks 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 (2 bytes each)
L - Energy per attack for attacks 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 (2 bytes each)
M - 00 00 00 00
N - Level per attack for attacks 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 (1 byte each)
P - Spell cast on hit?

















---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------






Header:     05 00 10 02 00 00 03 00 FF FF 



Human:      5F 01 31    00 00 00 00 00 80 01 00 48 75 6D 64 6E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 28 28 28 28 28 64 64 64 64 64 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Half-Ogre:  60 01 31 30 00 00 00 00 00 80 0A 00 48 61 6C 66 2D 4F 67 72 65 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 46 14 14 19 3C 19 96 3C 3C 46 96 3C 01 1E 00 24 00 07 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0F 00 14 00 64 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Kang:       60 01 31 31 00 00 00 00 00 80 0B 00 4B 61 6E 67 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 37 1E 1E 2D 32 1E 78 5A 5A 6E 6E 55 00 23 00 15 00 07 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 0A 00 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Nekojin:    60 01 31 32 00 00 00 00 00 80 0C 00 4E 65 6B 6F 6A 69 6E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 3C 28 1E 1E 32 64 82 64 5A 50 6E 00 32 00 66 00 0D 00 26 00 05 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 32 00 00 00 0A 00 F6 FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Gaunt One:  60 01 31 33 00 00 00 00 00 80 0D 00 47 61 75 6E 74 20 4F 6E 65 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 32 3C 32 1E 1E 64 6E 8C 64 46 50 00 32 00 0D 00 4D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 C8 00 0A 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 

-- 00s gap --

Header: 01 00 94 03 00 00 FF FF 03 00 

Goblin:     5F 01 39 00 00 00 00 00 80 09 00 47 6F 62 6C 69 6E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 1E 37 2D 28 28 28 46 7D 73 64 64 64 00 23 00 0D 00 66 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 41 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00


-- random info --
01 00 02 00 DD 03 00 00 FF FF FF FF 0B 01 31 33 
00 00 00 00 00 80 03 00 0A 01 38 00 00 00 00 00 
80 01 



Header:     07 00 54 01 00 00 01 00 00 00 

Dwarf:      5F 01 32 00 00 00 00 00 80 02 00 44 77 61 72 66 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 32 1E 1E 32 32 1E 6E 5A 5A 78 78 55 00 1E 00 24 00 0D 00 60 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 4B 00 14 00 01 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Gnome:      5F 01 33 00 00 00 00 00 80 03 00 47 6E 6F 6D 65 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 23 2D 2D 28 28 23 5A 6E 6E 64 64 5A 00 14 00 24 00 0D 00 25 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 05 00 41 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Halfling:   5F 01 34 00 00 00 00 00 80 04 00 48 61 6C 66 6C 69 6E 67 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 14 3C 1E 28 28 28 3C 96 5A 64 64 64 FF 19 00 66 00 22 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Elf:        5F 01 35 00 00 00 00 00 80 05 00 45 6C 66 00 69 6E 67 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 23 32 32 28 1E 32 5A 78 78 64 50 78 00 2D 00 0D 00 66 00 45 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 32 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Half-Elf:   5F 01 36 00 00 00 00 00 80 06 00 48 61 6C 66 2D 45 6C 66 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 2D 2D 28 1E 32 5A 6E 6E 64 64 6E 00 0F 00 45 00 0D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 19 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Dark-Elf:   5F 01 37 00 00 00 00 00 80 07 00 44 61 72 6B 2D 45 6C 66 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 32 32 1E 1E 28 5A 78 78 64 5A 6E 00 2D 00 0D 00 66 00 3A 00 6A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 50 00 00 00 01 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Half-Orc:   5F 01 38 00 00 00 00 00 80 08 00 48 61 6C 66 2D 4F 72 63 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 2D 28 1E 1E 32 1E 6E 64 5A 5F 78 50 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 




Just race info:
             a  b  c    |<---- d ------>|  e    |<---- f ------------------------------------------------------------------------------>|  g  h  i  j  k  l  m  n  o  p  q  r  s  t     u     v     w     x     y     z     1     2     3     4     5     6     7     8     9     0     A     B     C     D
Human:      5F 01 31    00 00 00 00 00 80 01 00 48 75 6D 64 6E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 28 28 28 28 28 64 64 64 64 64 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Half-Ogre:  60 01 31 30 00 00 00 00 00 80 0A 00 48 61 6C 66 2D 4F 67 72 65 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 46 14 14 19 3C 19 96 3C 3C 46 96 3C 01 1E 00 24 00 07 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0F 00 14 00 64 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Kang:       60 01 31 31 00 00 00 00 00 80 0B 00 4B 61 6E 67 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 37 1E 1E 2D 32 1E 78 5A 5A 6E 6E 55 00 23 00 15 00 07 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 64 00 0A 00 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Nekojin:    60 01 31 32 00 00 00 00 00 80 0C 00 4E 65 6B 6F 6A 69 6E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 3C 28 1E 1E 32 64 82 64 5A 50 6E 00 32 00 66 00 0D 00 26 00 05 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 32 00 00 00 0A 00 F6 FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Gaunt One:  60 01 31 33 00 00 00 00 00 80 0D 00 47 61 75 6E 74 20 4F 6E 65 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 32 3C 32 1E 1E 64 6E 8C 64 46 50 00 32 00 0D 00 4D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 C8 00 0A 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Goblin:     5F 01 39    00 00 00 00 00 80 09 00 47 6F 62 6C 69 6E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 1E 37 2D 28 28 28 46 7D 73 64 64 64 00 23 00 0D 00 66 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 41 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
Dwarf:      5F 01 32    00 00 00 00 00 80 02 00 44 77 61 72 66 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 32 1E 1E 32 32 1E 6E 5A 5A 78 78 55 00 1E 00 24 00 0D 00 60 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 4B 00 14 00 01 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Gnome:      5F 01 33    00 00 00 00 00 80 03 00 47 6E 6F 6D 65 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 23 2D 2D 28 28 23 5A 6E 6E 64 64 5A 00 14 00 24 00 0D 00 25 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 05 00 41 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Halfling:   5F 01 34    00 00 00 00 00 80 04 00 48 61 6C 66 6C 69 6E 67 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 14 3C 1E 28 28 28 3C 96 5A 64 64 64 FF 19 00 66 00 22 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Elf:        5F 01 35    00 00 00 00 00 80 05 00 45 6C 66 00 69 6E 67 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 23 32 32 28 1E 32 5A 78 78 64 50 78 00 2D 00 0D 00 66 00 45 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 32 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Half-Elf:   5F 01 36    00 00 00 00 00 80 06 00 48 61 6C 66 2D 45 6C 66 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 2D 2D 28 1E 32 5A 6E 6E 64 64 6E 00 0F 00 45 00 0D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0A 00 19 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Dark-Elf:   5F 01 37    00 00 00 00 00 80 07 00 44 61 72 6B 2D 45 6C 66 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 28 32 32 1E 1E 28 5A 78 78 64 5A 6E 00 2D 00 0D 00 66 00 3A 00 6A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 50 00 00 00 01 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Half-Orc:   5F 01 38    00 00 00 00 00 80 08 00 48 61 6C 66 2D 4F 72 63 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 2D 28 1E 1E 32 1E 6E 64 5A 5F 78 50 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 




             u     v     w     x     y     z     1     2     3     4        5     6     7     8     9     0     A     B     C     D
Human:      00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Half-Ogre:  24 00 07 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    0F 00 14 00 64 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Kang:       15 00 07 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    64 00 0A 00 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Nekojin:    66 00 0D 00 26 00 05 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    00 00 32 00 00 00 0A 00 F6 FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Gaunt One:  0D 00 4D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    C8 00 0A 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Goblin:     0D 00 66 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    41 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
Dwarf:      24 00 0D 00 60 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    0A 00 4B 00 14 00 01 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Gnome:      24 00 0D 00 25 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    05 00 41 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Halfling:   66 00 22 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    00 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Elf:        0D 00 66 00 45 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    32 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Half-Elf:   45 00 0D 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    0A 00 19 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Dark-Elf:   0D 00 66 00 3A 00 6A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    50 00 00 00 01 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
Half-Orc:   00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00    00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 



a - how many bytes the next record is offset by
b - 01
c - some sort of record number.  When it's unique, it's 2 bytes.  When it's not (i.e. 31), it's 4 bytes
d - 00 00 00 00 00 80
e - Race ID number, e.g. Half-Ogre is #10, thus 0A 00
f - null terminated string of race name.  Can have garbage after null since it's fixed width
g - min strength
h - min intellect
i - min willpower
j - min agility
k - min health
l - min charm
m - max strength
n - max intellect
o - max willpower
p - max agility
q - max health
r - max charm
s - bonus/penalty HP per level
t - exp %
u through 4 are the codes (2 byte, signed)
        24 - Resist magic
        07 - Resist damage
        15 - Poison immunity
        02 - Defense
        05 - Resist fire
        03 - Resist cold
        0d - Night vision
        66 - Racial stealth
        26 - Racial tracking
        4d - Perception
        60 - Encumberance
        25 - Picklocks
        22 - Dodge
        45 - Mana
        3a - +Crit
        6a - "3rd alter attack"
5 through D are the values
